mapper.select: select e.*,d.deptname from emp e, dept d where e.deptno=d.deptno and state='0' order by e.deptno asc
select e.*,d.deptname from emp e, dept d where e.deptno=d.deptno and e.empno=#{empno}
select e.*,d.deptname from emp e, dept d where e.deptno=d.deptno and e.empid=#{empid} and e.state='0'
select e.*,d.deptname from emp e, dept d where e.deptno=d.deptno and e.empid=#{empid} and e.pwd=#{pwd} and e.state='0'

select e.*,d.deptname from emp e, dept d
e.deptno=d.deptno and e.name like '%' || #{search} || '%'
e.deptno=d.deptno and d.deptname like '%' || #{search} || '%'
